import React, { useState, useEffect}from 'react'; import {Link, Redirect, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { isAuthenticated } from '../auth'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchRecord } from '../actions/index'; import './css/style.css'; import fb from '../images/facebook.png'; import twitter from '../images/twitter.png'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo/logo.png'; function Header(props) { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const handleChange = e => { // setSearch(e.target.value) setSearch(e.target.value) } const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.fetchRecord(search); setSearch(""); } if (props.products && props.products.products.length > 0) { return (

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { // console.log(state.products[1]); return { products:state.products } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ fetchRecord: (search)=> { dispatch(fetchRecord(search)) } }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Header);
